import React from 'react' import { Formik, Form, Field } from "formik" import Router from 'next/router' import addEducation from '../../../services/faculty/basic-info/addEducation' class EducationForm extends React.Component{ constructor(){ super() this.state = { duplicateForms: [] } } clone(){ this.state.duplicateForms.push(
) this.setState({ }) } remove(){ this.state.duplicateForms.pop() this.setState({ }) } render(){ let EducationDetails = { institutionSchool: "", degreeCert: "", majorSpecialization: "", startDate: "", endDate: "", proof: "" } return( { console.log(values.proof) let form = document.getElementById('educForm') let formData = new FormData(form) formData.append('facultyId', '1') formData.append('status', 'For Verification') await addEducation(values, formData) Router.reload() }} > {({ values, errors, touched, isSubmitting }) => (

{this.state.duplicateForms}

)} ) } } export default EducationForm
